variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

variants.name: gzip
variants.description: Enable GZIP for some input and output files

variants.name: debug
variants.description: Builds a debug version of the executable

dependencies.name: vtk
dependencies.description:
The Visualization Toolkit (VTK) is an open-source, freely available
software system for 3D computer graphics, image processing and
visualization.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
Intel MPI. This package has been replaced by intel-oneapi-mpi. LICENSE
INFORMATION: By downloading and using this software, you agree to the
terms and conditions of the software license agreements at
https://intel.ly/393CijO.

dependencies.name: jpeg
dependencies.description:
MozJPEG is a patched version of libjpeg-turbo which improves JPEG
compression efficiency achieving higher visual quality and smaller file
sizes at the same time

dependencies.name: zlib
dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.
